entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of rain beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 30%

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
